title: Why Elon Musk just gave away $1 million to a Wisconsin voter
shortDescription: Musk took to X to announce that "Scott A." from Green Bay had won the sum for signing Musk's "Petition In Opposition To Activist Judges."

title: Canadian travel to US plummets following Trump's tariff threats
shortDescription: After U.S. President Donald Trump’s tariff threats, former Prime Minister Justin Trudeau urged people to travel domestically.

title: Trump administration sues to invalidate dozens of union contracts
shortDescription: The Trump administration sued saying dozens of labor contracts at federal agencies unfairly impede his ability to purge the federal workforce.

title: Why GOP lawmakers are lukewarm on Trump’s Greenland desires
shortDescription: Republicans in Congress would likely be needed to approve any plan to annex Greenland, and several told USA TODAY they aren't sure that's a good idea.

title: Trump asks Supreme Court to lift judge's pause on Venezuelan removals
shortDescription: A federal judge temporarily blocked the deportation of alleged members of Venezuela's crime gang Tren de Aragua, which Trump wants to overturn.

title: How Trump's influence could put a spin on figure skating's top event
shortDescription: Skaters are competing in Boston at the ISU World Figure Skating Championships amid shifting international perceptions about the United States.

title: The Trump administration keeps shifting its Signal narrative
shortDescription: How did The Alantic magazine's editor wind up in a group chat where officials discussed imminent airstrikes? The Trump team's explanations clash.

title: Democrats target Musk in bellwether Wisconsin court race
shortDescription: The tech billionaire and aide to President Trump has dropped almost $20 million on a state Supreme Court race. Democrats say Elon Musk is meddling.

title: Did Trump's Greenland play backfire?
shortDescription: A planned U.S. delegation to Greenland was cut from a three-day cultural visit to less than 24 hours on the tundra amid possible protests.

title: U of Michigan rolls back DEI amid pressure from Trump admin
shortDescription: University President Santa Ono informed staffers in an email, saying Michigan remains committed to diversity among its students, faculty and staff.

title: Trump aides pledge to preserve Signal chat about attack on Houthis
shortDescription: The nonprofit American Oversight sued Trump Cabinet members to force them to preserve Signal messages that could otherwise be automatically deleted.

title: Lawmakers warn Trump he can't 'pick and choose' what to spend
shortDescription: Trump says he can spend less than Congress appropriates, but the top two members of the Senate Appropriations Committee say otherwise.

title: Trump administration captured top street gang leader. What is MS-13?
shortDescription: A look at the MS-13, a gang which began in Los Angeles but has emerged as a powerful force throughout Central America.
